Package org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.business

Class AvisService

java.lang.Object
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.business.base.SuperService<AvisEntity,AvisDto,AvisRepository,AvisMapper>
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.business.AvisService
@Service @Transactional public class AvisService extends SuperService<AvisEntity,AvisDto,AvisRepository,AvisMapper>
Service providing business logic and CRUD operations for reviews. Extends the generic SuperService for AvisEntity and AvisDto.
